course_title: Concepts and Methods in Cultural Anthropology
course_description: This course explores key concepts in cultural anthropology. Through engaging ethnographic accounts from different world areas, students will analyze anthropological debates about culture, race, religion, ritual, health, gender, sexuality, politics, and/or exchange and learn about fieldwork methods.
